**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 131 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A _composer staff_ is short and shaped like an elegant black conductor's baton with a silver tip. When waved through the air, it hums melodically. In this way, you can play it as though it were an instrument, and it grants a +1 item bonus to [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks made with it. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Composer Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 131 1.1 **Price** 80 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_haunting hymn_](/Spells.aspx?ID=924), [_summon instrument_](/Spells.aspx?ID=721)
  • **1st** [_concordant choir_](/Spells.aspx?ID=886)
Composer Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 131 1.1 **Price** 480 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **2nd** [_sonata span_](/Spells.aspx?ID=998)
  • **3rd** _concordant choir_, [_roaring applause_](/Spells.aspx?ID=987), [_sculpt sound_](/Spells.aspx?ID=714)
Composer Staff (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 131 1.1 **Price** 1,800 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The item bonus is +2.
  • **4th** [_infectious melody_](/Spells.aspx?ID=933)
  • **5th** _concordant choir_, _sculpt sound_
name: Composer Staff (Greater)
